metadata.title: CVE-2024-57918 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fix page fault due to max surface definition mismatchDC driver is using two different values to define the maximum number ofsurfaces: MAX_SURFACES and MAX_SURFACE_NUM. Consolidate MAX_SURFACES asthe unique definition for surface updates across DC.It fixes page fault faced by Cosmic users on AMD display versions thatsupport two overlay planes, since the introduction of cursor overlaymode.[Nov26 21:33] BUG: unable to handle page fault for address:0000000051d0f08b[  +0.000015] #PF: supervisor read access in kernel mode[  +0.000006] #PF: error_code(0x0000) - not-present page[  +0.000005] PGD 0 P4D 0[  +0.000007] Oops: Oops: 0000 [#1] PREEMPT SMP NOPTI[  +0.000006] CPU: 4 PID: 71 Comm: kworker/u32:6 Not tainted 6.10.0+ #300[  +0.000006] Hardware name: Valve Jupiter/Jupiter, BIOS F7A0131 01/30/2024[  +0.000007] Workqueue: events_unbound commit_work [drm_kms_helper][  +0.000040] RIP: 0010:copy_stream_update_to_stream.isra.0+0x30d/0x750[amdgpu][  +0.000847] Code: 8b 10 49 89 94 24 f8 00 00 00 48 8b 50 08 49 89 94 2400 01 00 00 8b 40 10 41 89 84 24 08 01 00 00 49 8b 45 78 48 85 c0 74 0b<0f> b6 00 41 88 84 24 90 64 00 00 49 8b 45 60 48 85 c0 74 3b 48 8b[  +0.000010] RSP: 0018:ffffc203802f79a0 EFLAGS: 00010206[  +0.000009] RAX: 0000000051d0f08b RBX: 0000000000000004 RCX:ffff9f964f0a8070[  +0.000004] RDX: ffff9f9710f90e40 RSI: ffff9f96600c8000 RDI:ffff9f964f000000[  +0.000004] RBP: ffffc203802f79f8 R08: 0000000000000000 R09:0000000000000000[  +0.000005] R10: 0000000000000000 R11: 0000000000000000 R12:ffff9f96600c8000[  +0.000004] R13: ffff9f9710f90e40 R14: ffff9f964f000000 R15:ffff9f96600c8000[  +0.000004] FS:  0000000000000000(0000) GS:ffff9f9970000000(0000)knlGS:0000000000000000[  +0.000005] CS:  0010 DS: 0000 ES: 0000 CR0: 0000000080050033[  +0.000005] CR2: 0000000051d0f08b CR3: 00000002e6a20000 CR4:0000000000350ef0[  +0.000005] Call Trace:[  +0.000011]  <TASK>[  +0.000010]  ?
